title: Winning streak - Data analysis with ArrayList FRQ

content.question: Complete method getLongestHomeWinStreak. /** * Returns the number of games in the longest streak of * consecutive games where the home team scored more than * the away team * Preconditions: allGames is not empty. * No elements of allGames are null. * Postcondition: allGames is unchanged. */ public int getLongestHomeWinStreak()

frqParts.text: Complete method getLongestHomeWinStreak. /** * Returns the number of games in the longest streak of * consecutive games where the home team scored more than * the away team * Preconditions: allGames is not empty. * No elements of allGames are null. * Postcondition: allGames is unchanged. */ public int getLongestHomeWinStreak()

skill.text: 2.A: Write program code to implement an algorithm.
